alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 1:39PM MST until January 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Estancia Valley, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40 near Clines Corners and Moriarty. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands
